name: Pac-Man Classic
description:
A Pac-Man remake on itch.io that actually took a VERY long time to make.
Made 100% in Scratch
Uploaded from Turbowarp

I spent about 5 days and 2 hours on this project, and didn't even think about uploading it here until a year later. It still has a few bugs, but the gameplay is 99% accurate.

I don't think this link will work forever, but if you wanna play the real pac-man then here ya go. https://www.retrogames.cc/arcade-games/pac-man-midway-1.html

Notes from scratch version:

Instructions

Controls are on the left.

How to play:
Avoid ghosts.
Eat a big dot to eat the ghosts.
Eat all of the pellets in the maze to win.

Hard mode:
This speaks for itself.

Mobile:
Adds mobile controls.

New:
Recreates the mobile port(the official one).

Have fun!

Notes and Credits

Most credits are in the project.

@cloter for original project

Namco for Pac-Man
